<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _ready_ rune draws component pieces of a suit of armor toward one another, making it easier and faster to get into. You can don light armor with this rune as a 3-action activity or medium or heavy armor with this rune in 1 minute.
